acf.heading: Get a celecoxib (Celebrex) prescription online.
acf.first_paragraph: Select your symptoms within the Maple app so the doctor can evaluate your symptoms and condition. Enter as much information as possible so that the doctor can make a thorough assessment.

accordion.accordion_title: What is celecoxib (Celebrex) and how does it work?
accordion.accordion_intro:
Celecoxib (Celebrex) is a medication that belongs to the nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory (NSAID) family of drugs. It’s a COX-2 inhibitor.

A celecoxib prescription works by blocking the production of the prostaglandins enzyme in your body. Decreasing the amount of this enzyme helps reduce pain and swelling.

accordion.accordion_title: What are the uses for celecoxib (Celebrex)?
accordion.accordion_intro: If you speak with a doctor on Maple, they may decide you would benefit from an online celecoxib prescription, Most commonly, it’s used to treat acute pain and swelling, often caused by different types of arthritis.
accordion.accordion_content:
There are a number of different kinds of arthritis a Celebrex prescription can help treat, including:

  • Osteoarthritis
  • Rheumatoid arthritis
  • Juvenile rheumatoid arthritis
  • Ankylosing spondylitis

In some cases, a celecoxib prescription can also be used to treat menstrual pain and discomfort caused by cramping or swelling.

accordion.accordion_intro:
If a doctor from Maple has given you an online Celebrex prescription, it will only be available as a capsule that must be taken orally.

This medication can be taken with or without food.
accordion.accordion_content: Dosage and frequency of use will depend on recommendations from your doctor and the severity of your condition. Never exceed the dosage that prescribed to you by your doctor, as it could increase your chances of experiencing negative side effects.

accordion.accordion_title: What are the side effects and risks of celecoxib (Celebrex)?
accordion.accordion_intro:
The most common side effects from taking a celecoxib prescription include:

  • Headache
  • Heartburn
  • Loss or change in sense of taste
  • Stuffy or runny nose
  • Skin rash
  • Bloating and gas
  • Back pain
  • Nausea
  • Insomnia

These side effects are normal and not cause for immediate concern, unless they persist or worsen. However, there are some serious side effects that could occur while taking a Celebrex prescription. These should be reported to your doctor immediately. They include:

  • Severe headache
  • Sudden, unexplained cough
  • Fever
  • Pain or swelling in the groin or calf areas
  • Difficulty swallowing
  • Signs of kidney problems, such aschange in colour, frequency or amount of urine
  • Symptoms of heart failure, such as: unusual tiredness, swelling of ankles and feet, unusual weight gain)
accordion.accordion_content:
In rare cases, a celecoxib prescription can cause serious liver disease, which can be potentially fatal if left untreated. You should seek immediate medical attention if you start to experience:

  • Persistent or severe nausea or vomiting
  • Severe stomach or abdominal pain
  • Dark urine
  • Loss of appetite
  • Yellowing of skin or eyes

It’s very rare to experience an allergic reaction while taking this medication. However, you should also contact your doctor immediately if you begin to experience the following symptoms:

  • High-grade fever
  • Rashes or hives
  • Itching or swelling (especially of the face, throat or mouth)
  • Severe dizziness
  • Difficulty breathing
  • Swollen lymph nodes

accordion.accordion_intro:
Before starting an online celecoxib prescription, you should tell your doctor if you have a history of:

  • Asthma
  • Kidney problems
  • Liver disease
  • Stomach, intestine or esophagus problems
  • Heart disease
  • Blood disorders
  • Nasal polyps
  • High blood pressure

These previous or underlying conditions could increase your risks of negative side effects while taking a Celebrex prescription.
accordion.accordion_content:
In some cases, kidney problems can occur while taking NSAID medications, including Celebrex. These problems are more likely to occur if you are dehydrated, or if you have a history of kidney or heart disease. If you have a history of such conditions, you should discuss possible alternatives with your doctor to avoid an increased risk of negative side effects.

A celecoxib prescription may also cause stomach bleeding. patients who also consume alcoholic beverages and use tobacco products daily are at an increased risk. Talk to your doctor before starting Celebrex if you’re using these products on a daily basis.

This medication is not recommended for pregnant women, as it could increase the risk of miscarriage. Women who are attempting to conceive may also have difficulty getting pregnant.  While a Celebrex prescription will pass into breast milk, there are no immediate risks for breastfeeding children. However, you should still talk to your doctor before starting to nurse while taking this medication.
